item.description:
This is a continuation of the Universalis session from March 13th's meeting. If you're interested in trying Universalis (a GM-less RPG which focuses on storytelling rather than statistics, and on suspense and freedom rather than railroading and predetermined plot), this is the game to try. Because no one owns any characters, it is easy to join or leave.

Some choice bits from our setting as it stands:

  • In Hell they use Microsoft products exclusively
  • Eden exists as a paradise between the frozen and infernal regions of hell
  • Nietzsche did nothing to stop Eden from being hacked, but the cybernetic half whales-half dolphins suffered a great deal to partially absorb the effects of the accompanying packet storm
  • The patch to fix the network intrusion inadvertantly cuts out the matrix, and "jack addicts" took to the streets of paradise, rioting!
  • God's having major PR issues
item.how_to_find_us: Call Christian for details of how to get there.
item.why: Hell is freezing over! (well, half of it) A vast secret conspiracy bent on destroying Earth has hacked Hell itself! Nietzsche is God's drinking buddy! Only we can decide the fate of the Universe, of Existence, of Eternity itself!
item.name: Universalis Session: Hell is The Place To Be Part 2
